org.steveleach.scoresheet

Class FakeFileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.steveleach.scoresheet.support.FileManager
      • org.steveleach.scoresheet.FakeFileManager

  • public class FakeFileManager
extends FileManager
    A "fake" FileSystem implementation for testing purposes. The fake filesystem is backed by a hashmap of pathnames to file contents (strings). It therefore only really supports text files currently.
    Author:
    Steve Leach
